mapper.insert: insert into CRM_CONTACTS_INFO (CONTACTS_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, CUSTOMER_ID, CONTACTS_KINDS, CONTACTS_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, QQ, WECHAT, ADDRESS) values (#{contactsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactsKinds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select CONTACTS_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, CUSTOMER_ID, CONTACTS_KINDS, CONTACTS_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, QQ, WECHAT, ADDRESS from CRM_CONTACTS_INFO where CONTACTS_ID = #{contactsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select CONTACTS_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, CUSTOMER_ID, CONTACTS_KINDS, CONTACTS_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, QQ, WECHAT, ADDRESS from CRM_CONTACTS_INFO

SELECT CONTACTS_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, CUSTOMER_ID, CONTACTS_KINDS, CONTACTS_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, QQ, WECHAT, ADDRESS FROM CRM_CONTACTS_INFO
AND CONTACTS_ID LIKE '%' || #{filter.contactsId, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
AND CREATED_BY LIKE '%' || #{filter.createdBy, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
AND #{filter.createdTimeBefore, jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} <= CREATED_TIME
AND CREATED_TIME < #{filter.createdTimeAfter, jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}
AND UPDATED_BY LIKE '%' || #{filter.updatedBy, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
AND #{filter.updatedTimeBefore, jdbcType = TIMESTAMP} <= UPDATED_TIME
AND UPDATED_TIME < #{filter.updatedTimeAfter, jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}
AND CUSTOMER_ID LIKE '%' || #{filter.customerId, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
AND CONTACTS_KINDS LIKE '%' || #{filter.contactsKinds, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
AND CONTACTS_NAME LIKE '%' || #{filter.contactsName, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
AND PHONE LIKE '%' || #{filter.phone, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
AND EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{filter.email, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
AND QQ LIKE '%' || #{filter.qq, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
AND WECHAT LIKE '%' || #{filter.wechat, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
AND ADDRESS LIKE '%' || #{filter.address, jdbcType = VARCHAR} || '%'
